knimeNode.name: Number Formatter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The node is normalizing numbers in the table by adding leading and trailing zeros to provide constant length of numbers in the table.

fullDescription.intro:
This node needs one column with the numbers that need to be modified.
The node will create a new sortable string column or replace existing one with the formatted numbers so all of them have a constant number of digits.
NumberNumber Formatted
202.00
10.510.50
3.3303.33
Node works only on positive numbers.
fullDescription.option: Choose a column to be formatted
Choose this if you want to dismiss the source columns

ports.inPort: Input port with the table to be formatted.
ports.outPort: Output port with the table contained numbers after modification
